SELECT V.vote_sn AS voteSn , V.vote_name AS voteName , V.category_sn AS categorySn , V.content AS content , V.start_date AS startDate , V.end_date AS endDate , V.finish_yn AS finishYn , V.target_config_yn AS targetConfigYn , V.target_vote_count AS targetVoteCount , V.age_open_yn AS ageOpenYn , V.sex_open_yn AS sexOpenYn , V.private_open_yn AS privateOpenYn FROM enigma.vote AS V
ORDER BY V.vote_sn DESC
SELECT VI.vote_sn AS voteSn , VI.vote_item_sn AS voteItemSn , VI.vote_item_name AS voteItemName , VI.photo AS photo FROM enigma.voteitem AS VI WHERE VI.vote_sn = #{voteSn}
